hero-text-login: Welcome back, enter your login details
hero-text-restore: To recover your password, enter your email address
text-restore-success: Further instructions for password recovery have been sent to the specified email address
registration-success-description-with-ht: You have successfully registered on the site <0>My Texter</0>. Next, you need to activate your account by clicking on the link in the letter on your email <1></1> If you don't see the email in the incoming mail, please check the spam folder.
activation-success-description-with-html: You have successfully activated your account on the website <0>My Texter</0>
wrong-name: The name must be no shorter than 3 characters and no longer than 10
wrong-email: This must be a valid email address
wrong-password: The password must consist of 6-12 characters and contain at least 1 letter, 1 digit and 1 special character.
